description: Erection of an eight storey building to north east corner of the site, retaining existing portico and wall fronting Stamford Street, and comprising 58 flats with 19 car parking spaces at basement level, together with roof terraces at seventh and eighth storey level. Demolition of existing gymnasium and caretakers house and erection of extensions to the existing school including: at the rear of the site a four storey wing and sports hall with outdoor recreation area on part of the roof;  three storey extension to Duchy Street elevation; second and third floor level extension west of the main building above the service courtyard; alterations to vehicular and pedestrian site accesses and associated works. (This application is a departure from UDP Policy RL27)
